confirm.clearHistory: You will clear permanently your chat history. Other participants' history of this chat won't be deleted. This action is irreversible.
confirm.deleteChannel: Are You sure to delete this channel?
confirm.deleteSpace: Are You sure to delete this space?
confirm.leaveChannel: Are You sure to leave the channel?
confirm.leaveGroup: Are You sure to leave the group?
confirm.leaveSpace: Are You sure to leave the space?
confirm.removeBuddy: Are you sure you want to remove this buddy?

action.instantMeetingAlreadyRunningText: Creating a new one will overwrite the older one and your attendee will lost the connection, what would you do?
action.instantMeetingAlreadyRunningTitle: An instant meeting is already running
action.joinChannel: Join the channel to send messages and to receive notifications
action.selectMoreParticipantsForInstantMeetings: Select a participant from the list or type the address to add an external user

addModeratorModalDescription: Select one or more users to promote them to moderators of this Room

connection.offline: It seems to be a server connection issue

conversationsList.noActiveChats: There aren't active Chats at the moment. Create a new Chat or switch tab.
conversationsList.noActiveInstantMeetings: There aren't active Instant Meetings at the moment. Create a new Instant meeting or switch tab.
conversationsList.noActiveMeetings: There aren't active Rooms at the moment
conversationsList.noActiveSpaces: There aren't active Spaces at the moment. Create a new space or switch tab.
conversationsList.noFilteredChats: There aren't Chats that correspond to this filter.
conversationsList.noFilteredInstantMeetings: There aren't Instant Meetings that correspond to this filter.
conversationsList.noFilteredMeetings: There aren't Rooms or planned meetings that match this filter
conversationsList.noFilteredSpaces: There aren't Spaces that correspond to this filter.

channel.mainDescription: Channels are a well-defined topic chats that are included into a Space. Space's participants can join the Channel to actively discuss about its topic. Participants can abandon the Channel without leaving the Space too.
channel.setImageAndTitleDescription: Set an image to better recognize the Channel inside the hosting Space. Channel's image can also be set or changed on Channel's info panel.
channel.titleInputRequirements: 140 characters allowed, Title must be unique inside hosting Space
channel.topicDescription: Since channels are chats driven by the topic discussed, a topic that better describe the subject is recommended.
channel.topicInputExplanation: It describes the subject of the Channel

chat.addParticipant: Choose a participant to start a Chat with
chat.chatFilterDescription: You can create a chat just by clicking on the participant you want to talk to
chat.description: Chats are one to one conversations that help you to keep in touch with contacts.

group.addParticipantsDescription: Invite participants by typing their name or e-mail addresses. You need to invite at least two other participants, otherwise you can create a Chat.
group.inputTopicDescriptionLabel: It describes the subject of the Group
group.mainDescription: Groups need to include more than two participants. Name the Group as preferred in order to describe it's subject
group.setImageAndTopicDescription: Set an image that will help users to identify the Group within the ones in the list.

instantMeeting.addAttendees: Add attendees to your Instant Meeting
instantMeeting.addAttendeesDescription: Invite attendees by typing their name or e-mail address here.
instantMeeting.addAttendeesInputExplanation: You can invite also external users just by typing their e-mail address.

feedback.negative: The email entered is not a valid one, please insert a valid address

instantMeeting.description: Instant meetings are video calls that are designed to be quick and momentary, no trace of the chat will be kept and once the call is over, it will cease to exist. Instant meetings can be created by Pro users can be also joined even from external users.
instantMeeting.titleDescription: You should give to the Instant Meeting a recognizable Title, so your attendees will know the purpose of this call.

space.addMembersDescription: Invite people by typing their name or e-mail addresses. You need to invite at least two other people, otherwise you can create a Chat.
space.mainDescription: Spaces are generic communication environments that include specific chats called Channels, each one with its own topic. To create a Space you need to invite at least to participants. Channels can be added directly from the Space's info panel.
space.titleDescription: The title identifies the Space and thus is should describe in a couple of word it's topic.
space.topicDescription: Since Spaces are chats driven by the topic discussed, a topic that better describe the subject is recommended.
space.topicInputExplanation: It describes the subject of the Space

creation.titleInputRequirements: 140 characters allowed, Title must be unique

deleteMessageModal.description: When deleting a message, it won't be visibile anymore to you and all other recipients

deleteRoomModalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the Room?
descriptionHistoryClearedInfo: This conversation is now empty, it has been moved on the bottom of the conversations list in order to emphasize the active ones.

waiting.userJoinedWaitingRoom: There seems to be someone in the waiting room

input.topicOptional: Optional. It describes the subject matter

instantMeeting.continue: Continue with the old instant meeting

meeting.defaultViewModeDedicatedLabel: The "Dedicated Mode‚Äù will redirect you to a separated tab of your browser to enjoy the Meeting experience at its best.
meeting.defaultViewModeDefaultLabel: Selecting the "Default Mode", the Meeting will start in the current internal environment.
meeting.defaultViewModeSecondaryDescriptionLabel: This option will be saved in your settings and can be updated every time you want.

interactions.muteUserForAllDescription: By muting the user, all the participants won't hear the user anymore. Only muted user can be unmute himself. Proceed?
interactions.mutedByModerators: You've been muted by a moderator, unmute yourself to speak

status.cameraMicOff: Your camera and microphone are off

meeting.roomLinkTooltip: Copy this link to share the Room

startModal.description: How do you want to enter the meeting?

mockDisplayDescription: Choose a conversation to start a chat

modal.endCallByOwner: The owner of the instant meeting has decided to end the call, we hope you enjoined the instant meeting experience

moderatorCannotLeaveGroupTitle: Wait, a new moderator is needed

feedback.emailReplicated: The email entered has already been added

requires.one: Requires at least one more participant

placeholder.pickAddress: Start typing to pick an address

planMeeting.description: Room's name helps the attendees to know the Room's matter of discussion.

roomsFunctionalitiesChangelog: We have made important changes to the meeting functionalities. Read the introduction to the Rooms to find out more!

participants.none: You have reached the limit of participants set by the administrator

meeting.description: Set your audio and video preferences to enter in meetings. You'll can always customize your preferences before entering in every meeting.
meeting.personalRoomResetDescription: By resetting Personal Room's link, all the previously given accesses will not work anymore.

modal.description: Here you can set all Team's dedicated preferences in order to enjoy a complete customized chatting experience!

title.openMinichat: Open as a new message arrives
title.openMinichatForGroup: Open as a new Group message arrives
title.openMinichatForSingle: Open as a new Single message arrives
title.openMinichatForSpace: Open as a new Space message arrives

notifications.description: Set your preferences for every type of notification in Team.

profile.chooseAProfilePic: Choose a profile pic to let other users see, the image will be centered automatically.
profile.statusOptionalDescription: Optional. Let others now what are you thinking about. Max lenght: 256 characters
profile.title: Profile

title: Title

meetingUrl.description: Copy this link and share it to provide others with access to this Room.
